column4: does anybody know a good video converter/encoder that is easy to use and to install I am using Kubuntu 7.10 installed on my PS3

see if I can install debian or DSL on my PS3
nicodariousdo you have a PS3
yeah, I bought it back when I first went to Iraq.
it's the older model though.
1st or 2nd gen type.
what model is it
is there any way to tell?  by model number or something?
how many GIGS is it 60 or 20 or 40 or 80
60 gig
looking for a model number on it now.
that is the same model I have
would you like to install linux on your PS3
i'm thinking about it.  It's not doing as much as I had hoped as far as gimeing for my wife.  She still likes her gamecube (blah).  so might as well put it to work.
man, I have looked all over this thing.  all I can find is a dern serial number.

its ok I mean there is some stuff you can do and some stuff you cant do I suggest you try going to www.PSUBUNTU.com and read up on it before if you want at least that is what i did and since I do not have a PC a went ahed and did it until I get one
thanks for the site.  I'll check it out!
the number of gigs is how you tell wha model you see at first ther wher two models the 20GB and the 60GB model now there is the 80GB and the 40GB model
ahh. I see.  so the 60 GB is the 1st gen I take it?
btw, how powerful is the Cell porcessor, since you can only use one core for Other OSes?
I am not sure since I dont know that much about it I do know If I had to say its ok but not the greatest but it is better than nonthing I guess

cool!  well, I'll try it out after I have read and have made a decision on what I would like to install.  I have heard word that plugging in Puppy Linux USB stick or a DSL stick works, but I have been reluctant to do such a thing.
